column4: anyone have experience with booting fedora and ubuntu?  Does Fedora not 'play nice' with ubuntu?  As in I can install Win7 Ubuntu and Ubuntu sees Win7, but when I install Fedora, it doesnt 'see' Ubuntu...
it's definatly doable, how much experience do you have with linux?

been using ubuntu for quite some time, just tried to install fedora and it didnt 'see' ubuntu.  Reinstalled ubuntu and it saw all of the others just fine.  Just curious if Fedora is a bit predatory...
fedora and ubuntu ought to work togeather in the exact same way (as in, they dont interact) the fedora installer probably just doesnt have ubuntu detection in it
